articles.author: jackrosa
articles.description:
number < atom < reference < function < port < pid < tuple < map < list < bitstring
random_data = [["Hello World"], {:hello, :world}, 16, %{key: "value"}, :atom]
Enum.sort(random_data)
#=> [16, :atom, {:hello, :world}, %{key: "value"}, ["Hello World"]]
4 < :atom
#=> true
articles.title: Elixir Data Type Comparison - #elixir

articles.author: craighafer
articles.description: ActionView::Helper using #link_to_if <%= link_to_if(current_user.nil?, "Login", login_path) %> true it would output: Login false it just outputs the text: Login <%= link_to_if(current_user.nil?, "Login", login_path) do link_to("Logout", logout_path) end %> link_to_unless method available docs if you're interested.
articles.title: Conditional link_to - #rails
